'''Genesis''' is a [[MUDs|MUD]] based on the Norwegian MUD [[Ringen]]. It was translated into English and converted to MUD-format by [[P책l-Kristian Engstad]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/mud/katmandus/Genesis.html Tolkien Games]</ref> It consists of both old regions like [[Moria]] (from the original Ringen MUD) and new region like [[The Shire]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> The game contains at least 50 quests and has six different races: [[Men|Humans]], [[Elves]], [[Hobbits]], [[Gnomes]], [[Dwarves]] and [[Orcs|Goblins]].<ref>Genesis at [http://www.lysator.liu.se/mud/katmandus/Genesis.html Lysator] (Retrieved 4 August 2011)</ref> The game was released in 1988 and is still running. In 1991 a new version was published.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
